Name: Mezcal Fruit Cup (Diffords No.8 Cup)
Ingredients: 25 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage.
Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish
Review: While some struggle to appreciate mezcal- its robust, slightly smoky character adds depth and complexity to this delicious summery cocktail.
History: Created in June 2017 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England. For more recipes and history see Fruit Cups and Pimm's .
Nutrition: One serving of Mezcal Fruit Cup (Diffords No.8 Cup) contains 210 calories
